title: disconnecting in championselect (Just tip)
body:
Hello Riot,
I came here to suggest something:
Maybe you should focus on your game and it's bugs instead of bringing out skins every day. I've heard from quite alot people that they have the same issue with this game like me and (as expected) a lot of bugs.

My Issue and the issue of many other people is, that in championselect im getting disconnected and there's written "Trying to reconnect".
AND PLEASE RIot: Don't answer me with the message "Please check our connection guide, because the issue is caused by you"
My connection is perfectly fine and i have not even a single problem (referring to connection) with any other games I play.
Only your game has these kinds of issues, in particular.

I really hope that you will fix this problem, because I'm getting punished by not banning/picking due to this bug. It really takes the fun away.

I'm aware that you have to pay your employees and that you need money from skins, etc... but you really really should focus on fixing alot of (gamebreaking) bugs.

P.S: Vandyril is popular for finding many many bugs. But I'm sure you know him already :)

kind regards from a big League of Legends fan.

replies.body: Sieht aus als hättest du dir viel Mühe gegeben, aber wir sind trotzdem im deutschen Forum c:
Ne, viel Mühe war das nicht, ich wollte nur in internationaler Sprache meine Wut ausdrücken, damit auch jeder darauf aufmerksam wird :D

Bringt dir leider nicht viel da du hier im deutschen Forum postest. Du hättest es daher genauso gut in Deutsch halten können.

Wenn du Riotler erreichen willst würde ich dir raten ans NA-Forum zu posten, oder die Feedback Option unten rechts im Client zu verwenden die extra dafür geschaffen wurde.
